note.p: Birth: Barnsbury Square, North London, England (17 April 1866)
Death: Steamship pulling into Kingston harbour, Jamaica (02 May 1927)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1928 vol 102 pp xvii-xxvii, plate, signed by C J M
References: W van der Kloot, 'Ernest Starling's analysis of the energy balance of the German people during the blockade, 1914-19' in NR 2003 vol 7 pp 185-193
W van der Kloot, 'April 1915: Five Future Nobel Prize-Winners Inaugurate Weapons Of Mass Destruction And The Academic-Industrial-Military Complex' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 149-160
